SELECT MDI_LINKNO, MDI_DPTNAME, MTI_TEAMNO, MTI_TEAMNAME, MAC_ANICODE1, MVI_VVRMNAME, TO_CHAR (B.NSRDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') TXT_NSRDATE, TO_CHAR (MAI_RESOSREGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') TXT_MAI_RESOSREGDATE, FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAI_ANICODE, '1') TXT_MAI_ANICODE_1, MAC_NAME, MAI_ANICODE, FN_GETCOMCODE_CLS3NAME ('200', '251', DAIO_RESN) TXT_DAIO_RESN, SUM (CASE WHEN (MAI_SEX IN ('1', '3')) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MAI_SEX_M, SUM (CASE WHEN (MAI_SEX IN ('2', '4')) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MAI_SEX_F, SUM (CASE WHEN (MAI_SEX IN ('5', '6')) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MAI_SEX_A, COUNT (MAI_SEX) CNT_MAI_SEX FROM MF_ANI_INFO A, MF_ANI_CLS, MF_VVRM_INFO, MF_TEAM_INFO, MF_DPT_INFO, DT_ANI_IO C, ( SELECT DAIO_ANICODE, MAX(CASE WHEN NOT (DAIO_IOTYPE = '2' AND DAIO_RESN = '1') THEN DAIO_IODATE END) AS DATE1, MAX(CASE WHEN DAIO_IOTYPE = '1' AND DAIO_BOYUKSTS = 'Y' THEN DAIO_IODATE END) AS NSRDATE FROM DT_ANI_IO
WHERE TO_CHAR(DAIO_IODATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{cal_1}
GROUP BY DAIO_ANICODE ) B WHERE MAI_ANICODE = B.DAIO_ANICODE AND MAI_VVRMNO = MVI_VVRMNO AND MAI_ANICLSCODE = MAC_ANICLSCODE AND B.DAIO_ANICODE = C.DAIO_ANICODE AND DAIO_IOTYPE = '1' AND DAIO_IODATE = B.NSRDATE AND A.CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND MVI_TEAMNO = MTI_TEAMNO AND MTI_DPTNO = MDI_LINKNO
AND (MAI_DETHTYPE = '1' OR MAI_DETHTYPE = '2' AND NOT #{cal_1} >= TO_CHAR(MAI_DETHDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND #{cal_1} <= TO_CHAR(DAIO_RENTEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT E.* FROM DT_ANI_IO E WHERE B.DAIO_ANICODE = E.DAIO_ANICODE AND B.DATE1 = E.DAIO_IODATE AND DAIO_IOTYPE = '2') GROUP BY MDI_LINKNO, MDI_DPTNAME, MTI_TEAMNO, MTI_TEAMNAME, MAC_ANICODE1, MVI_VVRMNAME, TO_CHAR (B.NSRDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR (MAI_RESOSREGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAI_ANICODE, '1'), MAC_NAME, MAI_ANICODE, FN_GETCOMCODE_CLS3NAME ('200', '251', DAIO_RESN)
mapper.select:
WITH BREED_LIST AS (
) SELECT * FROM BREED_LIST ORDER BY MAC_ANICODE1, TXT_MAI_ANICODE_1, MDI_DPTNAME, MTI_TEAMNAME, TXT_MAI_ANICODE_1, TXT_NSRDATE DESC, TXT_MAI_RESOSREGDATE DESC

WITH BREED_LIST AS (
) SELECT MAC_ANICODE1, TXT_MAI_ANICODE_1, SUM (MAI_SEX_M) MAI_SEX_M, SUM (MAI_SEX_F) MAI_SEX_F, SUM (MAI_SEX_A) MAI_SEX_A, SUM (CNT_MAI_SEX) TOT_MAI_SEX FROM BREED_LIST GROUP BY MAC_ANICODE1, TXT_MAI_ANICODE_1 ORDER BY MAC_ANICODE1, TXT_MAI_ANICODE_1
